name: Kaijuu
description:
A 2D diorama game based on Japanese mythology "My lord bag of rice".  

Keys:

arrow keys and WASD for movement

left and right click on mouse to fire arrows

ball of string - increase amount of arrows fired

temple bell - stuns and clears enemies

bag of rice - increases health 

This is the game file, once the file has been downloaded please open this file in construct 3.

Thank you
